summary: An Ordinance transferring the sum of Two Hundred Thousand ($200,000) Dollars from the "General Fund" of the City of Seattle to the "Sewer Extension Fund" as a final refund of Five Hundred Thousand ($500,000) Dollars advanced Dec. 14, 1910, to the General Fund as a temporary loan by the "Sewer Extension Fund" made under authority of Ordinance No. 25880, approved Dec. 14, 1910.
